site_name: EXCALIBUR ESTATE REGENERATION AREA, BAUDWIN ROAD, LONDON, SE6
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted in compliance with Condition (7) 'Facing Materials - Block 14' in respect of Phase 1C only of the S73 planning permission, DC/21/120231 dated 2/11/2022 for the 'variation of Condition 5 (consented plans) of planning permission dated 30 March 2012, (DC/10/75973), for the 'redevelopment of the Excalibur Estate SE6, seeking full planning permission for residential units in Phase 1, and outline planning permission in Phase 2 for residential units, together with car and cycle parking, associated highway infrastructure, soft and hard landscaping including the provision of open space'; as amended by S96a (DC/21/120376) dated 18/2/21, in order to allow changes to Phase 1C in relation to the Spine Road and Home Zone streets reconfiguration; relocation of the sub-station; additional car parking spaces, provision of three additional units; changes to unit mix and tenure; wheelchair unit provision, and amendments to the design of the buildings.
